Japanese: おい……このニオイは!
Google Translate: Hey...this smell!

Japanese: ……ごちそう?
Google Translate: ...A feast?

Japanese: そんな感じね
Google Translate: That's what it feels like

Japanese: たまらん!
Google Translate: I can't help it!

Japanese: ああ、船に乗っていた人たちですね⏸ごちそうのニオイに⏎ひかれて来たんですか?
Google Translate: Ah, those were the people on the ship. Were they attracted by the smell of the feast?

Japanese: いえ……
Google Translate: home……

Japanese: いや、そのとおりだ⏸正直に言って、その……
Google Translate: No, that's right⏸To be honest, that...

Japanese: そうそう、正直が一番です⏸では、正直に こたえてください⏸あなたたちは オルですか?
Google Translate: That's right, honesty is the best ⏸ Now, please answer honestly ⏸ Are you guys old?

Japanese: とんでもない!
Google Translate: no way!

Japanese: 影の大王の手下でもない?
Google Translate: Are you not a subordinate of the Great Shadow King?

Japanese: もちろん
Google Translate: of course

Japanese: オレたちは ただの はらをへらした⏎旅人だ
Google Translate: We are just hungry travelers.

Japanese: ふふふ……正直な音です⏸では食事の用意をさせましょう。⏎おーい、ミキータ
Google Translate: Hehehe... that's an honest sound ⏸ Now let's prepare the food. ⏎Hey, Mikita

Japanese: (美しい むすめだな……)
Google Translate: (What a beautiful daughter...)

Japanese: (きれいだ……)
Google Translate: (It's beautiful...)

Japanese: (へんな服!)
Google Translate: (Strange clothes!)

Japanese: はい、モキート様。⏎お食事の用意はできております⏸もちろん、お客様のぶんも ございます
Google Translate: Yes, Mr. Mokito. ⏎The meal is ready⏸Of course, she will also take care of the guests.

Japanese: では、みなさん、こちらへ
Google Translate: Well, everyone, come here.

Japanese: いいニオイの料理と⏎かわいい 女の子
Google Translate: Good-smelling food and cute girls

Japanese: あやしい。ああ、あやしい!⏸どうして わたしたちの ぶんまで⏎用意してあるのよ
Google Translate: Suspicious. Oh, how suspicious! ⏸Why did you even prepare ⏎ for us?

Japanese: 前にも こんな事 あったわよね?⏸あのふたり、かいぶつじゃないの?⏎それともオルかしら?
Google Translate: Something like this has happened before, right? ⏸ Aren't those two monsters? ⏎ Or maybe it's Ol?

Japanese: うむ。影の大王の手下という事も⏎ありうる
Google Translate: Hmm. It is also possible that he is a subordinate of the Great Shadow King.

Japanese: しかし、それがなんだと言うのだ!⏎もしそうなら、たたかい、たおすのみ!
Google Translate: But what is that? ⏎If so, just fight and defeat!

Japanese: リーフ、それでいいわけ?
Google Translate: Leaf, is that okay?

Japanese: ここまで来ちゃったんだ⏸もし、ふたりが てきなら ただで⏎帰れないのは同じ事
Google Translate: We've come this far⏸If we're together, it's free⏎It's the same thing that we can't go home

Japanese: それに……⏸あのメイドさん、何か言いたそうだった
Google Translate: Besides...⏸That maid seemed to want to say something.

Japanese: よし、たしかめよう。行くぞ
Google Translate: Okay, let's check. Let's go

Japanese: もう!
Google Translate: already!

Japanese: どうしたの? おいしいわよ
Google Translate: What's wrong? It's delicious.

Japanese: ああ。しかしジャスミン。⏎おまえは さっきまで……
Google Translate: ah. But jasmine. ⏎You were just a little while ago...

Japanese: フィリとクリーが食べているもの。⏎きっと安全よ
Google Translate: What Fili and Cream are eating. ⏎It's definitely safe

Japanese: はははは、どくなんか⏎入っていませんよ!
Google Translate: Hahahaha, there's no poison in it!

Japanese: では、わたしは 少し席をはずします。⏎じゅんびを しなくては……
Google Translate: Now, I'll step aside for a moment. ⏎He has to get ready...

Japanese: じゅんび?
Google Translate: preparation?

Japanese: ちょっと聞きたいのだが……
Google Translate: I'd like to ask you something...

Japanese: もうしわけございません!⏎何もお話は できないのです
Google Translate: I'm sorry! ⏎I can't talk to you about anything.

Japanese: やっぱり……ふつうじゃないよね
Google Translate: After all... it's not normal.

Japanese: 今さら、なによ
Google Translate: What now?

Japanese: 気になる事があるんだ
Google Translate: I have something to worry about.

Japanese: バルダ! カギが……
Google Translate: Barda! The key is...

Japanese: がんじょうだな……
Google Translate: You're so strong...

Japanese: モキートさん、ごちそうさま!⏎わたしたちは 先を急ぐので とびらを……
Google Translate: Mokito-san, thank you for the meal!⏎We're in a hurry, so open the door...

Japanese: そうはいかないんだ⏸ボクは食後のデザートに⏎ナゾを出すのが大好きでね⏸そのナゾを といたら⏎キミたちを自由にしてあげよう⏸というわけで、モキートの⏎マジックハウスへようこそ!
Google Translate: That's not the case⏸I love serving ⏎riddles for dessert after meals⏸If you solve that riddle, ⏎I'll set you all free⏸So, welcome to Moquito's ⏎Magic House!

Japanese: マジック?
Google Translate: magic?

Japanese: ハウス?
Google Translate: House?

Japanese: すぐにわかるさ。⏎きけんは無いから安心して
Google Translate: You'll understand right away. ⏎There will be no danger, so don't worry

Japanese: めんどうな事になってきたぞ……
Google Translate: Things have become troublesome...

Japanese: おなかいっぱい。⏎何も考えられない
Google Translate: My stomach is full. ⏎I can't think of anything

Japanese: まあ、きけんなヤツでは なさそうだ。⏎はらごなしに つきあってやるか
Google Translate: Well, he doesn't seem like a dangerous guy. ⏎Would you like to hang out with me?

Japanese: 今のは、ミキータの声よ!
Google Translate: This is Mikita's voice!

Japanese: やっぱり!
Google Translate: on second thoughts!

Japanese: なぜ?
Google Translate: why?

Japanese: ぼくのオムレツに 文字が書いてあった
Google Translate: There were words written on my omelet.

Japanese: なんて?
Google Translate: What?

Japanese: てけすた……
Google Translate: Tekesta...

Japanese: テケスタ? それはなんだ?
Google Translate: Tequesta? What is that?

Japanese: あっ! さかさに読むのね!
Google Translate: Ah! You read it upside down!

Japanese: てけすたを さかさに?
Google Translate: Turn the star upside down?
Ta……⏎su……

Japanese: なんだと!!
Google Translate: What!!

Japanese: ミキータは ここに⏎閉じこめられて いるのかもしれない
Google Translate: Mikita may be trapped here.

Japanese: はらが立つわね
Google Translate: It makes me angry

Japanese: うん。モキートめ!
Google Translate: Yeah. Mokito!

Japanese: ちがうわよ。⏎すぐに言わなかったリーフ、あなたよ
Google Translate: That's different. ⏎It's you, Leaf, for not telling me right away.

Japanese: ケンカは あと!
Google Translate: No more fighting!

Japanese: ミキータ!
Google Translate: Mikita!

Japanese: ミキータなら、食事のあとかたづけだよ。⏎だからボクたちは ゲームをしよう
Google Translate: If it's Mikita, it's cleaning up after the meal. ⏎So let's play a game

Japanese: どんなゲームだ?
Google Translate: What kind of game is it?

Japanese: バルダ! ふつうに会話しないでよ!
Google Translate: Barda! Don't talk to me normally!

Japanese: さっきの ひめいは?
Google Translate: What was your secret earlier?

Japanese: あれかい?⏎ミキータが皿を わってしまってね
Google Translate: Is that it?⏎Mikita broke the plate.

Japanese: ウソだろ!⏸ミキータは ぼくたちに⏎助けを もとめていたぞ!
Google Translate: That's a lie! ⏸Mikita was asking you for ⏎help!

Japanese: フフフ……ミキータが そんな事を?⏎それなら、ナゾを といてみたまえ
Google Translate: Fufufu...Mikita did something like that?⏎In that case, please take a look at the riddle.

Japanese: どうしてそうなるのよ!
Google Translate: How can that be?

Japanese: フフフ……⏸めちゃくちゃな時代だからね。⏎ボクだけ まともなはずは ないだろう?
Google Translate: Hehehe...⏸It's a messed up time. ⏎He can't be the only one who's sane, right?

Japanese: (開きなおった……)
Google Translate: (It reopened...)

Japanese: フフフ、ここまで来たか⏸では次のナゾは……これだ
Google Translate: Hehehe, have we come this far⏸The next riddle is...this.

Japanese: あっ!!
Google Translate: Ah!!

Japanese: 待ちなさい!!
Google Translate: Wait!!

Japanese: やれやれ……
Google Translate: Oh my...

Japanese: 何が やれやれよ!
Google Translate: What can I do!

Japanese: こういう めんどうは⏎考えていなかったな⏸あきらめて あいつのゲームとやらに⏎つきあうしかなさそうだ
Google Translate: I hadn't thought about this kind of trouble. It seems like I'll have no choice but to give up and play with that guy's game.

Japanese: いやー、ありがとう。⏎つきあってくれて、本当にありがとう!
Google Translate: No, thank you. ⏎Thank you so much for hanging out with me!

Japanese: オレたちは 何につきあったのだ?
Google Translate: What happened to us?

Japanese: 言ってみれば……たいくつしのぎ……かな
Google Translate: If you ask me, it's like...

Japanese: なんて人なの!
Google Translate: What a person!

Japanese: そうだよね。ひどいよね
Google Translate: That's right. That's terrible, isn't it?

Japanese: 何か わけがありそうだな
Google Translate: There seems to be a reason

Japanese: あの、みなさん、おねがいがあります。⏎ボクもいっしょに旅へ……
Google Translate: Well, everyone, I have a favor to ask of you. ⏎Let's go on a journey together...

Japanese: モキート様、またですか!⏸旅に出ても どうせ すぐに⏎戻ってくるんでしょう?
Google Translate: Mokito-sama, see you again! Even if you go on a trip, you'll be back soon, right?

Japanese: ああ、そうだよ。⏎ボクなんか……ボクなんか……⏸家出しても 船に乗って⏎またもどって……そのていどさ
Google Translate: Ah, that's right. ⏎Something like me...Something like me... ⏸Even if I run away from home, I'll get on a boat ⏎I'll come back again... That's how it is.

Japanese: みなさん⏸モキート様が ごめいわくを⏎おかけしました
Google Translate: Everyone, Mr. Mokito is sorry for the inconvenience.

Japanese: あのさ⏸オムレツに『たすけて』って書いたよね?
Google Translate: You know, I wrote “Help me” on the omelet, right?

Japanese: いいえ。⏎わたしは テケスタって書いただけです
Google Translate: no. ⏎I just wrote Tequesta.

Japanese: どういう意味よ
Google Translate: What do you mean?

Japanese: さあ、書きたくなっただけですわ
Google Translate: Well, I just felt like writing.

Japanese: オレたちを からかったんだな!
Google Translate: You were making fun of us!

Japanese: たいくつしのぎには なったでしょ?
Google Translate: You've become a great horse, haven't you?

Japanese: ぼくたちには 使命があるんだ⏸たいくつなんか これっぽっちも⏎感じているヒマは ないよ
Google Translate: We have a mission⏸We don't have time to feel even the slightest bit.

Japanese: それは しあわせね
Google Translate: That's a blessing

Japanese: バカにしているのか?
Google Translate: Are you making fun of me?

Japanese: いいえ⏸影の大王が支配する こんな時代。⏎人生の もくてきなんて どこにもない⏸そんな中で 使命を持てるなんて⏎とても しあわせだと思うわ
Google Translate: No ⏸This is the era when the great king of shadows rules. ⏎There is no place for him in my life ⏸To be able to have a mission in such a situation ⏎I feel very lucky.

Japanese: ああ! たいくつだー!
Google Translate: Ah! That's so many!

Japanese: さて、次のひまつぶしを⏎考えなくちゃ
Google Translate: Now, I have to think about the next time to kill time.

Japanese: では、しあわせな みなさん。⏎きをつけて
Google Translate: Well then, happy people. ⏎Be careful

Japanese: あれもまた、影の大王の ぎせい者かもな
Google Translate: That might also be the shadow king's gimmick.

Japanese: そうかしら?⏸生きる事が せいいっぱいの人も⏎たくさんいるわよ
Google Translate: Is that so?⏸There are many people who are full of life⏎

Japanese: たいくつなんて してるヒマはない人たち
Google Translate: People who don't have time to wear many shoes

Japanese: うむ……
Google Translate: Hmm...

Japanese: ジャスミン……りっぱになったな⏸森で好きかってにくらしていた女の子が⏎世の中を知り、成長したというわけだ
Google Translate: Jasmine... she has become so beautiful ⏸ The girl who used to spend her life in the forest ⏎ learned about the world and grew up.

Japanese: それ、ほめてるの?
Google Translate: Is that a compliment?

Japanese: もちろん!
Google Translate: of course!

Japanese: モキートとミキータ。⏎……なんだか はらが立ってきたぞ
Google Translate: Mokito and Mikita. ⏎...For some reason, she's starting to get angry.

Japanese: おそい!
Google Translate: Late!

Japanese: たいくつだよ……
Google Translate: That's a lot...

Japanese: じゃあ、また 旅に出る?
Google Translate: So, are you going on a trip again?

Japanese: もういい。⏎外はこわいからね
Google Translate: Enough is enough. ⏎It's scary outside

Japanese: そう、現実はおそろしいわ⏸ここで ゆめを見ながら⏎いっしょに くらしましょう⏸たいくつだけど、影の大王が見せる⏎あくむよりは ずっといいでしょ?
Google Translate: Yes, the reality is scary ⏸ Let's live here together while looking at the dreams ⏎ It's a lot, but it's much better than the shadow king showing us ⏎ Isn't it?

Japanese: ねえ、ミキータ。⏸リーフたちなら どんなゆめを⏎見せてくれるかな?
Google Translate: Hey, Mikita. ⏸What kind of dreams will the Leafs show you?

Japanese: やっぱり あくむだと思うわ。⏎あの人たち きっと 怒ってるもの
Google Translate: I think he's going to yawn after all. ⏎Those people must be angry.

Japanese: ひっ!
Google Translate: Hey!

Japanese: Q1⏎⏎ゾウがあそんでいたのは?
Google Translate: Q1⏎⏎What was the elephant playing with?

Japanese: Q2⏎⏎ほんものの『ネズヌク』はどれ?
Google Translate: Q2⏎⏎Which one is the real “Nezunuku”?

Japanese: Q3⏎⏎じゃあほんものの『マナス』はどれ?
Google Translate: Q3⏎⏎Then, which one is the real “Manas”?

Japanese: Q4⏎⏎食堂にかざってあった絵はどれ?
Google Translate: Q4⏎⏎Which picture was hanging in the dining room?

Japanese: Q5⏎⏎正しい『リーフ』はどれ?
Google Translate: Q5⏎⏎Which is the correct “leaf”?

Japanese: Q6⏎⏎正しい『バルダ』はどれ?
Google Translate: Q6⏎⏎Which is the correct “Barda”?

Japanese: Q7⏎⏎正しい『ジャスミン』はどれ?
Google Translate: Q7⏎⏎Which is the correct “jasmine”?

Japanese: Q8⏎⏎城のえいへいをしていたのは?
Google Translate: Q8⏎⏎Who was taking care of the castle?

Japanese: Q9⏎⏎ほんものの『影の大王』の⏎マークはどれ?
Google Translate: Q9⏎⏎Which is the ⏎ mark for the real “King of Shadows”?

Japanese: Q10⏎⏎リスメアの町のルーレットで⏎ジャスミンがもらった物はどれ?
Google Translate: Q10⏎⏎What did Jasmine receive from the roulette wheel in Lismere town?

Japanese: 3つのまちがい⏎⏎上と下の画面にまちがっているばしょが⏎3かしょあります⏎下画面をタッチして こたえてね!
Google Translate: 3 mistakes⏎⏎There are ⏎3 incorrect answers on the top and bottom screens⏎Touch the bottom screen to answer!

Japanese: 玉であそんでいるゾウのぞうだ
Google Translate: It's a statue of an elephant playing with a ball.

Japanese: なにか、ふしぎなちからで⏎閉ざされている
Google Translate: Something is closed off in a mysterious place.

Japanese: またゲームをしたいのかい?
Google Translate: Do you want to play games again?

Japanese: そうかい じゃあ⏎先にすすむがいいさ
Google Translate: That's right, then ⏎You can move on first.

Japanese: ここで いっしょに⏎くらしたいのかい?
Google Translate: Do you want to live here together?

Japanese: あなたも ものずきね⏎また来るなんて⏸ここが気に入ったのかしら
Google Translate: You too, Monozuki⏎I can’t wait to come again⏸I wonder if you liked it here?
